work.summary: Software development and consulting for frontend and backend software

Cashflow analysis: overview of profitability for individual products

Implmenetation of mobile apps in scanner handhelds for intralogistic warehouse processes like inventory management, inbound, stock transfer, ad-hoc movements, information for storage bins and handling units.
Programming extensions in SAP Sales, Materials Management and HR
Integration and development of interfaces with an enterprise-service-bus
Setting up the Fiori launchpad platform
Programming of SAP IS-H solutions, subscreens and GUI's
Implementation of the new release management in hospitals ยง301 SGB
